articles.title: Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with People Who Contributed to Successful Test-fire of SLBM
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Has Photo Session with People Who Contributed to Successful Test-fire of SLBM 
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, called to the building of the Central Committee of the WPK the scientists, technicians, workers and officials who made contributions to the successful test-fire of SLBM and fully demonstrated the strong might of Songun Korea all over the world, and had a photo session with them. 
					 When Kim Jong Un appeared in the venue of the photo session, all the participants broke into enthusiastic welcoming cheers. 
					
					 The acquisition of the SLBM firing technique is another historical event which fully displayed the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea over the world, he said, before highly praising the feats of scientists, technicians, workers and officials in the field of national defence science and munitions factories who developed the powerful strategic weapon as an excellent present to the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK. 
					
					 He said the eye-opening miracle could be created thanks to the ardent loyalty, noble patriotism and fortitude displayed by the scientists, technicians, workers and officials to glorify the undying exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed for the development of the Juche-oriented national defence industry, and to unconditionally carry out the militant task set forth by the party. 
					
					 He had a photo session with them after repeatedly praising their feats. 
					
					 He expressed expectation and belief that they would produce much more cutting-edge military hardware of Korean style for implementing the strategic plan of the WPK Central Committee and thus make positive contributions to increasing the capabilities of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army in quality in the future, too. 
					
					 Kim Chun Sop and Ri Pyong Chol were also present there.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter to Chongryon and Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter to Chongryon and Koreans in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un on Monday sent a letter "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il" to the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and Koreans resident in Japan on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of Chongryon's founding.
					 The full text of the letter is as follows:
					
					 I feel happy that Chongryon (General Association of Korean Residents in Japan) is greeting the 60th anniversary of its founding in the stirring period when a dynamic struggle is being waged to celebrate the 70th anniversaries of national liberation and founding of the Workers' Party of Korea as grand national events.
					
					 On the occasion of this anniversary, I extend warm congratulations and compatriotic greetings to Chongryon officials including Chairman Ho Jong Man and to all other compatriots in Japan.
					
					 Chongryon is a prestigious body of the overseas citizens of our Republic, which the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il formed and led.
					
					 The proud road travelled by Chongryon bears the imprints of the wise guidance and painstaking efforts of the great leaders, who strengthened and developed Chongryon into a Juche-based overseas compatriots' body that represents the rights and interests of all the Koreans resident in Japan.
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Il Sung was the pioneer of an overseas compatriots' movement in the era of independence, founder of Chongryon and saviour and benevolent father of the Koreans resident in Japan.
					
					 With an insight into the actual situation of the movement of Koreans in Japan which was wandering at the crossroads of rise and fall in search of  its correct road, the President saved the movement from the crisis by advancing a sagacious policy on the change of its line, and had Chongryon, the first-ever Juche-based overseas compatriots' body, formed. He indicated the road ahead of Chongryon at every stage of the development of the movement of Koreans in Japan, and led with great affection the organization and Koreans resident in Japan to follow the road resplendent with glory.
					
					 The great Comrade Kim Jong Il was an outstanding leader who, true to the President's great idea, developed Chongryon into a pacesetter of patriotism, into a model of patriotic loyalty to the motherland and into a prototype body of overseas compatriots. He was also the saviour of the destiny of Chongryon and the Koreans resident in Japan.
					
					 He built up the ranks of Chongryon officials into single-heartedly united ranks strong in ideology and faith, and defended the organization on the strength of Songun. Regarding Chongryon as part of the socialist country and the Koreans resident in Japan as his own flesh and blood, he ensured that even in the difficult days, when the country was making the Arduous March, material and spiritual assistance was rendered unsparingly to the development of the national education by Chongryon, the dignity of Koreans in Japan and their stabilized life. Thanks to his trust and warm affection, Chongryon could demonstrate its pride in being a model overseas compatriots' body across the world.
					
					 Indeed, the 60 years of Chongryon is a brilliant history of the idea of Juche-based overseas compatriots' movement put forward by the great leaders and their wise guidance, and a history adorned with legendary tales of their ennobling love for the nation and overseas compatriots.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and enjoying their affection, Chongryon has travelled over the past six decades a glorious road of development, and performed great exploits for the motherland and the nation.
					
					 Sharing the destiny of the great leaders and the motherland, it has developed into invincible ranks that fully demonstrate its might of single-hearted unity. In the crucible of the struggle to establish the ideological and leadership system of Juche, it has become a truly Juche-based, patriotic body that regards believing in and following only the great leaders and realizing their intentions and wishes as its inherent duty. Today as a powerful body that has been rallied organizationally and ideologically based on the great Juche idea and that has struck its root deep among the broad sections of the masses of the Koreans resident in Japan, it is forcefully promoting the movement of Koreans in Japan. This is a proud, true feature of Chongryon.
					
					 Chongryon is demonstrating its might as a promising body which is invariably carrying forward the baton of patriotic work. In the face of difficult conditions in an alien land, it brings up the children of Korean compatriots into true patriots through its well-knit network of national education ranging from primary school to university, and has trained the hard core of the masses of Korean compatriots of the new generation including the core youth and businesspeople who will add brilliance to the history of the movement of Koreans in Japan, and they are stoutly carrying on the lineage of patriotic devotion. This is a pride of Chongryon and a source of its might.
					
					 Chongryon has rendered an active contribution to the sacred cause of achieving the prosperity of the socialist DPRK and the reunification of the nation. Its officials and other compatriots in Japan have rendered distinctive services to the prosperity of their motherland out of ardent patriotism, breathing the same air and keeping step with the people in their homeland. With confidence in the veracity of the policies of our Party and the government of the Republic on national reunification, Chongryon has done its best to implement them and contributed to cementing solidarity with the people of Japan and the rest of the world and raising the international profile of the Republic.
					
					 Our Party and the government of the Republic feel their greatest pride in having Chongryon, a patriotic overseas compatriots' body boundlessly faithful to its leaders, homeland and nation. 
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I offer tribute to Chongryon officials of the elder generations including Han Tok Su and other patriotic compatriots who dedicated all their lives to holding the great leaders in high esteem, organizing Chongryon and strengthening the movement of Koreans in Japan, and extend warm thanks to all the officials of Chongryon and other Korean compatriots in Japan who are devoting all their energy and zeal to accomplishing Chongryon's patriotic cause without seeking any personal fame or reward. 
					
					 Chongryon and Korean compatriots in Japan are now faced with the honourable task of adding glory to the immortal exploits of the great leaders and bringing about a new upsurge in the movement of Koreans in Japan by keeping step with the people in the homeland on a general onward march.  
					
					 Chongryon should do all of its undertakings thoroughly as intended and wished by the great leaders, and usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan true to the General's instructions. 
					
					 It should strengthen and develop itself as befits a powerful, Juche-based overseas compatriots' body that shines with the august names of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 It should pay primary concern to establishing the ideological and leadership system of Juche across its organizations and carry on this work without letup. 
					
					 It should hold the great Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem for ever, and staunchly defend and add eternal brilliance to their idea of building up Chongryon and their undying leadership exploits. It should take their ideology and achievements as the eternal guideline for the movement of Koreans in Japan, and thoroughly implement the instructions they gave Chongryon and the compatriots in Japan. 
					
					 It should continue to give priority to consolidating the single-hearted unity of its ranks in every way. 
					
					 All the organizations and officials of Chongryon, regarding this unity as the great foundation of the movement of Koreans in Japan, should rally themselves around the central leadership with one mind and purpose, and accomplish its patriotic cause, which was pioneered with comradely unity, by dint of comradeship. Its organizations should keep in mind that the single-hearted unity of the ranks of Chongryon and the warm affection shared by the compatriots are a source of its might and a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan, and make every possible effort to unite the masses of the compatriots rock-solid. 
					
					 It is important to conduct more dynamically the information and education work aimed at giving full play to the spiritual strength of Chongryon officials and other compatriots.
					
					 Chongryon should concentrate its efforts on the education of its officials and other compatriots in the greatness of the great leaders and Kim Jong Il's patriotism, and make constant efforts to educate them in the Korean-nation-first spirit and in the history and traditions of the movement of Koreans in Japan. In accordance with the changed situation, it should intensify education in faith so that all its officials and other compatriots including the new generation will steadily follow the road which has been travelled by their preceding generations, cherishing in their minds firm belief in the invincibility of their socialist motherland and the validity of the patriotic cause of Chongryon.
					
					 In line with the demands and conditions of the prevailing situation, Chongryon should establish a well-knit information and education system and make strenuous efforts to constantly create new and effective forms and methods of information and motivation work. Mass media, including Joson Sinbo, should increase their appeal by writing and editing their articles in a way that they suit to the characteristics and preparedness of readers. The Kumgangsan Opera Troupe and the song and dance troupes in local areas, as befit Juche-based overseas Korean national art groups developed under the leadership of the leaders, should conduct brisk artistic activities as suited to the emotion and psychology of the compatriots so as to deeply implant the soul of the Korean nation in them and inspire their patriotic enthusiasm.
					
					 Chongryon should build its subordinate organizations into powerful, patriotic ones which have taken root deep among the masses of the compatriots.
					
					 It should strengthen its chapters, branches and other grass-roots organizations into reliable buttresses infused with the love for the homeland and nation. It should direct its efforts to solidifying its chapters, the regional bases of the movement of Koreans in Japan. It should also enliven its branches, the basic units of living for the compatriots, in order to make every place where Koreans live brim over with harmony, unity and love for the country and nation. Chongryon organizations and affiliates at all levels should conduct powerful mass political work among compatriots to rally them in a larger number. By doing so, it can consolidate and continuously expand the mass foundation of the movement of Koreans in Japan. Adhering to the mass line in all types of its work, Chongryon should give top and absolute priority to affording the compatriots convenience in their living and defending and guaranteeing their interests, and solve all problems by relying on their patriotic 
					
					 enthusiasm and creative efforts.
					
					 In order to expand and strengthen its patriotic motive force, Chongryon should channel all its efforts into a campaign to win back the compatriots while promoting it in close combination with various movements to develop national culture, mass-based sports activities, campaign to defend Koreans' rights, and service and welfare activities. By doing so, it should develop the campaign to win back the compatriots into a powerful one that advances forward by the efforts of Koreans, they themselves being its master.
					
					 It should continue to direct strenuous efforts to championing the democratic national rights and interests of Koreans in Japan and to developing national education, work with young people of the new generation and work with businesspeople.
					
					 Defending and guaranteeing the democratic national rights and interests of the Koreans resident in Japan is the basic mission and duty of Chongryon. Chongryon should make positive efforts to safeguard and expand all the rights our compatriots are entitled to as overseas citizens of a sovereign state, such as the rights to education, business and free travel to their motherland, and staunchly fight against all sorts of discriminative measures and inhumane acts that infringe upon their rights and interests.
					
					 National education is what Chongryon should invariably hold fast to as one of its central tasks. It should direct its main efforts to establishing the Juche orientation in its educational work and thus imparting love for the country and national identity, while improving the contents and methods of education as required by the era of the knowledge-based economy, thus giving play to the advantages and vitality of the democratic national education. Korea University should steadily improve its education level as befits a base for training able personnel for Chongryon, and thus bring up its students into genuine patriots and competent specialists. By doing so, it can exalt its authority and fame as the dignified university of the Republic's overseas citizens.
					
					 In the present situation when the younger generation is emerging in the society of Korean compatriots as the leading force of the patriotic movement of Chongryon, the future of the movement of Koreans in Japan depends on how these young people are brought up. Chongryon should train them into reliable successors who would carry forward the cause of Chongryon, a patriotic legacy bequeathed by the great leaders, invariably whatever the trials. The Korean Youth League in Japan, the Association of Korean Young Men of Commerce in Japan and the Union of Korean Students in Japan should add brilliance to the valuable inheritances the preceding generations achieved, and lead young Korean compatriots to live honourably anytime and anywhere keeping in mind that they are Koreans by origin. The Union of Democratic Korean Women in Japan should intensify its work with the women compatriots of the younger generation so that they can preserve the national identity of the society of Koreans an
					
					 d carry forward the proud tradition of turning one of the wheels of the patriotic movement of Chongryon.
					
					 Businesspeople, one of the basic sections of the masses under Chongryon and the main force in the movement of Koreans in Japan, should be actively enlisted in the patriotic work of Chongryon. The Federation of Korean Men of Commerce in Japan and other economic organizations should effectively protect and render wholehearted assistance to compatriots in their commercial and business activities, and thus ensure that they conduct their activities with great vigour.
					
					 By rendering services to hastening the prosperity and development of their socialist motherland and national reunification, Chongryon and our compatriots in Japan should perform the mission and patriotic duty they have assumed for the country and the nation.
					
					 They should devote their patriotic efforts to the sacred cause of achieving the prosperity of their socialist motherland. 
					
					 The destiny of our overseas compatriots is linked with that of their motherland; when their motherland becomes strong, the prestige of their organizations and themselves gets enhanced. Chongryon officials and our compatriots in Japan should champion the dignity and prestige of their socialist motherland in every way possible, and contribute to building theirs into a thriving socialist nation, those with strength dedicating their strength, those with knowledge devoting their knowledge and those with money donating their money.
					
					 They should uphold the three charters for national reunification, the June 15 Joint Declaration and the October 4 Declaration, and wage the national reunification movement dynamically. Chongryon should strengthen national unity with Koreans affiliated with "Mindan" (Federation of "ROK" Residents in Japan), and support and encourage the just struggle of their fellow countrymen in south Korea for independence, democracy and national reunification. 
					
					 Under the ideals of independence, peace and friendship, Chongryon should develop friendly ties with the progressive personages from various strata and other people of Japan so as to create on its own initiative an environment and conditions favourable for its work and the movement of Koreans in Japan and to help promote the DPRK-Japan relations.
					
					 For the success in ushering in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan at present, Chongryon should establish a well-regulated system of its work and improve its guidance methods in keeping with the changed situation and environment. 
					
					 The Central Committee of Chongryon should consistently carry out the tasks discussed and decided on the principle of democratic centralism, and intensify its unified guidance over its subordinate organizations, affiliates and other organs at all levels to ensure that they work in a lively manner and carry out their tasks. The prefectural headquarters of Chongryon should establish discipline and order whereby they carry out the decisions and directives of the Central Committee by relying on collective wisdom, and discharge their responsibility and role as regional leadership units of the movement of Koreans in Japan. The central leadership bodies of the affiliates and other organs of Chongryon should establish a well-regulated system of work in line with their characteristics, and bring guidance and assistance closer to their subordinate units to perform with credit the patriotic work in their respective fields. 
					
					 It is important to improve the work methods as demanded by the actual situation of Chongryon and the realities of the compatriots' society. 
					
					 By means of innovative insight, fresh style of work and seasoned and experienced methods of work, Chongryon organizations, affiliates and other organs at all levels should create a new spirit, a new feature of the movement of Koreans in Japan that is advancing full of vigour and vitality. 
					
					 Whether a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan is ushered in or not depends on the role of Chongryon officials.
					
					 Regarding the instructions of the great leaders as guidelines for their work and life, Chongryon officials should always go among the masses of the compatriots and become organizers and motivators who share sweets and bitters with them and enlist their spiritual strength. Maintaining the compatriots-first principle, they should display the spirit of boundless devotion and self-sacrifice for the national rights and happy future of their compatriots in Japan, in order that the latter regard Chongryon as their mother's embrace and sincerely trust, love and rely on it. 
					
					Chongryon is part of the socialist DPRK and the Koreans resident in Japan are brothers and sisters and family members of the motherland. 
					
					 Our Party and the government of the Republic will take care, on its own responsibility, of the destiny and future of Chongryon and the Koreans resident in Japan that the great President and General bequeathed, and do their best for the development of the movement of Koreans in Japan. 
					
					 I firmly believe that Chongryon officials and all other Korean compatriots in Japan will, in the future, too, throw in their lot with their socialist motherland invariably and fulfil their honourable responsibility and duty in their efforts to usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks Diamond Jubilee of Chongryon
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks Diamond Jubilee of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture Monday, the 60th anniversary of the formation of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, Vice-premier Kim Yong Jin, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party, Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, officials of public organizations, officials concerned, officials of ministries and national institutions, working people from all walks of life in Pyongyang, those related to Chongryon, a group of Koreans in Japan for expressing thanks to the homeland on the 60th anniversary of Chongryon and its delegations and overseas compatriots. 
					
					 Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report. 
					
					 He said that Chongryon is the first Juche-type overseas compatriots' body personally organized and led by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a dignified overseas citizens' body of the DPRK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The President considered the overseas compatriots' movement as an important part of the Korean revolution and gave origin to the Juche-based overseas compatriots' movement long ago.
					
					 The formation of Chongryon was a shining fruition of the President's idea of the Juche-based overseas compatriots' movement and his leadership and a historic event that brought about a fundamental turn in the movement of Koreans in Japan and in carving out the destiny of the Koreans in Japan and that injected fresh life into the development of overall overseas compatriots' movement of Korea and the overseas compatriots' movement in the world.
					
					 The Juche-based overseas compatriots' movement pioneered by the President developed in depth on a new higher stage despite severe storm and stress of history under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He clearly indicated tasks and ways for victoriously advancing Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan with his foresight.
					
					 Recalling that the President and Kim Jong Il formed Chongryon, a result of Juche, by founding original idea and theory on solving the issue of overseas compatriots and successfully embodying them and developed it into a patriotic pioneer, an example of patriotic loyalty and a model of the world overseas compatriots' movement, the reporter stressed that their revolutionary feats will last forever.
					
					 Chongryon and the movement of Koreans in Japan which have covered the road of victory along the orbit of Juche under the care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu are greeting a new heyday of their development as they are led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, the reporter said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's letter "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il" to Chongryon and Koreans resident in Japan marking the 60th anniversary of Chongryon is an encyclopedia for the movement of Koreans in Japan as it comprehends the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il's ideas and theories on the Juche-based overseas compatriots' movement. And it is the height of noble compatriotism and patriotism.
					
					 The DPRK government highly appreciates the feats Chongryon and Koreans in Japan have performed before the country and the nation over the past six decades and deems it great joy and pride to have an excellent overseas compatriots' body and overseas compatriots. 
					
					 Pae Ik Ju said in a speech that the President and Kim Jong Il were the tender-hearted fathers and protectors of the destiny of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan as they held Chongryon dearest and took warmest care of it all their lives.
					
					 It is the true patriotic road and the road of eternal victory to hold Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun of Juche and remain true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un, Pae noted, adding that this is the unshakable faith of the officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Reception Given to Mark 60th Anniversary of Formation of Chongryon
articles.content:
Reception Given to Mark 60th Anniversary of Formation of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A reception was given at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday, the 60th anniversary of the formation of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Present there on invitation were members of a group of Koreans in Japan for expressing thanks to the homeland on the 60th anniversary of Chongryon led by Pae Ik Ju, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon, a delegation of veteran officials of Chongryon led by Pak Jong Sang, adviser to the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, and other Koreans in Japan staying in the motherland and those related to Chongryon.  
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, Kim Yang Gon, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party, officials of social organizations and those concerned.
					
					 Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin said in a speech that Chongryon could record annals of victory and glory along the road of Juche despite storm and stress of history in the past period thanks to the wise leadership and warm loving care shown by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The DPRK and its people will always remember Chongryon and Koreans in Japan who have made great contributions to the prosperity of the country and its reunification under the uplifted banner of the great Juche idea during the past six decades, he noted.
					
					 Pae Ik Ju said that there are hundreds of millions of overseas compatriots in the world but it is rare to find such overseas compatriots as officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan who enjoy all the benefits generation after generation under the care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said that officials of Chongryon and Koreans in Japan would devote their patriotic efforts to ushering in a new heyday in the movement of Koreans in Japan, the last instruction of Kim Jong Il, and building the best, reunified and prospering country led by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Letter Conveyed to Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Letter Conveyed to Koreans in Japan
						
 Tokyo, May 25 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting of Koreans in Japan took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Monday to convey supreme leader Kim Jong Un's letter "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il" which was sent on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, officials concerned and Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's letter to Chongryon and Koreans in Japan was conveyed at the meeting.
					
					 A letter of thanks to Kim Jong Un was read out there.

articles.title: Letter of Thanks to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Letter of Thanks to Kim Jong Un from Koreans in Japan
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a letter of thanks from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Monday.
					 The letter noted that a meeting of Koreans in Japan was held to convey his letter "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il" to Chongryon and compatriots in Japan on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of Chongryon.
					
					 With ardent loyalty of all the Chongryon officials and compatriots in Japan, the Chongryon Central Standing Committee extends the deepest thanks and highest honor to Kim Jong Un for wisely leading the movement of Koreans in Japan to greater victory by personally sending his programmatic letter, it said.
					
					 His letter is important guidelines for the activities of Chongryon in the glorious era of Kim Jong Un as it indicates in an overall way the main orientation of Chongryon, the key task and the way for its implementation to bring about a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan by carrying out the behests of the great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, it added.
					
					 And it expressed the resolution of all the Chongryon officials and compatriots in Japan to unconditionally carry through the tasks set forth in the letter.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Celebrate 60th Birthday of Chongryon
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Celebrate 60th Birthday of Chongryon
						
 Tokyo, May 25 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting for celebrating the 60th anniversary of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Monday.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, officials concerned and other Korean residents in Japan.
					
					 Ho Jong Man in a report at the meeting said that the 60th anniversary of Chongryon, a precious patriotic legacy of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and a dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK is a significant event unprecedented in the history of world overseas compatriots' movement and a great auspicious event of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Noting that Marshal Kim Jong Un sent to Chongryon and Koreans in Japan his letter "Let Us Usher In a New Heyday of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il" on the occasion of the 60th birthday of Chongryon, the reporter said:
					
					 The letter is a great programme for the movement of Koreans in Japan in the glorious era of Kim Jong Un and highly important guidelines leading Chongryon to a new heyday for the happiness of the compatriots and rosy future of the rising generation.
					
					 The reporter noted that for the past 60 years Chongryon has vigorously conducted its patriotic activities for the homeland and the nation with loyalty to the leadership of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, overcoming unparalleled trials and difficulties.
					
					 Its precious achievements are a result of ardent patriotism and loyalty displayed by the officials of Chongryon, including the first generation, part-time activists, businessmen, Korean women and youths in Japan, he added.
					
					 The reporter stressed that with its 60th birthday as an occasion Chongryon should bring a new turn in the movement of Koreans in Japan as required by the glorious era of Kim Jong Un, in hearty response to his letter.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Monday, the 60th anniversary of the association.
					 The letter said that the 60 year-long history of Chongryon was a glorious and honorable course in which the Juche-based overseas compatriots' movement was pioneered and its victory and dignity was displayed thanks to the distinguished idea and leadership of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Greeting the 60th anniversary of Chongryon, all its officials and compatriots in Japan feel an ardent yearning for the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as well as the great happiness and honor of having Kim Jong Un as their supreme leader, a great pride of being the Korean nation blessed with illustrious leaders through generations, it said.
					
					 The letter noted that Kim Jong Un has guided Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan with his far-sighted wisdom and paternal love though he is very busy with his leadership over the building of a thriving socialist power, the showdown with the U.S. and the movement for national reunification.
					
					 The letter praised him as the tender-hearted father of Chongryon and Korean residents in Japan and a great teacher showing the road ahead of the movement of Koreans in Japan and guiding them to brave any difficulties and make new innovations with firm confidence in victory.
					
					 In hearty response to his historic letter, all the officials of Chongryon and compatriots in Japan will bring about a new turn in the movement of Koreans in Japan as taught by him, it said.

articles.title: Diamond Jubilee of Chongryon Feted in Japan
articles.content:
Diamond Jubilee of Chongryon Feted in Japan
						
 Tokyo, May 25 (KNS-KCNA) -- A reception was given at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on May 23 in celebration of the 60th anniversary of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon and officials concerned.
					
					 In his speech at the reception, Ho Jong Man referred to the honor of celebrating the 60th anniversary of Chongryon under the meticulous care of Marshal Kim Jong Un and expressed highest glory and heartfelt thanks to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Chongryon is now entering a new historic stage of its development under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, he said, evincing the will to usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan with its 60th anniversary as a momentum.
					
					 There was a performance of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe at the reception.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Danish Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Receives Credentials from Danish Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, received credentials from Thomas Lehmann, Danish ambassador to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations Here
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations Here
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations arrived here on Monday to take part in the 2015 briefing on investment in Wonsan-Mt. Kumgang international tourist zone.
					 They included a delegation of the Dalian Branch of the World Trade Association of Overseas Koreans, a delegation of the Chinese Liaoning Beisida Group Co. Ltd., a delegation of the Chinese Liaoning Provincial Hubei Commerce Chamber, a delegation of the Liaoning Northeast Asia Society for Promoting Economy and Culture and a delegation of the Global Businessmen's Group Co. Ltd. for Investment of Hong Kong, China.

articles.title: Vietnamese Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Vietnamese Party Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of Vietnam headed by Le Huu Nghia, vice-chairman of the Central Theory Council of the party, flew back on Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Boxers Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Boxers Back Home
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- DPRK boxers returned home on Tuesday after participating in the 2015 world juvenile and youth women's boxing championship held in Taipei of China.
					 DPRK boxers bagged a gold medal and a silver medal in the championship.

articles.title: Omani Foreign Ministry Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Omani Foreign Ministry Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Foreign Ministry of Oman led by Vice-Minister Ahmed Bin Yosif Obaid Al Harthi visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Tuesday.
					 The guests went round historic relics preserved with good care at his old home in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and the patriotic life of his family members.
					
					 They also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, the Rungna Dolphinarium and other places on the same day.

articles.title: Cuban Embassy Officials Give Helping Hands to Hwasong Vegetable Greenhouse Farm
articles.content:
Cuban Embassy Officials Give Helping Hands to Hwasong Vegetable Greenhouse Farm
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- German Hermin Ferras Alvarez, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and his embassy officials did friendship labor at the DPRK-Cuba Friendship Hwasong Vegetable Greenhouse Farm on Tuesday.
					 After being briefed on the history of the farm associated with the leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung, they helped farmers in weeding vegetable fields.
					
					 During a break they talked to officials of the farm.

articles.title: Members of Delegation of Veteran Officials of Chongryon Vow to Devote Themselves to Patriotic Cause
articles.content:
Members of Delegation of Veteran Officials of Chongryon Vow to Devote Themselves to Patriotic Cause
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Members of the delegation of veteran officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) vowed to devote themselves to the patriotic cause, upon receiving the historic letter of supreme leader Kim Jong Un "Let Us Usher in a New Heyday of the Movement of Koreans in Japan True to the Intention of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il."
					 Head of the delegation Pak Jong Sang said that every sentence of the letter makes him harden his resolution to dedicate himself to the patriotic cause, true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 I keenly felt kindred affection and ardent compatriotic love of Kim Jong Un who regards Chongryon and Koreans in Japan as part of the motherland, his own brothers and sisters and members of a big family and takes care of them in a responsible manner to the last, Pak noted, adding:
					
					 The Koreans in Japan can not live even a moment without the care of Kim Jong Un and the motherland.
					
					 Member of the delegation Kim So Ja said that Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan would work hard for the victorious advance of the movement of Koreans in Japan, frustrating every move of the Japanese reactionaries against Chongryon with the treasured sword of patriotism provided by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Member of the delegation An Pyong Ok noted that only when Chongryon and Koreans in Japan thoroughly carry out the letter of Kim Jong Un, can they enjoy a worthwhile and happy life on the road of patriotism for the country and the nation.
					
					 An Pyong Ok noted that we will remain overseas revolutionary comrade who shares will, intention and destiny with Kim Jong Un and develop Chongryon into eternal invincible patriotic ranks.

articles.title: Mt. Myohyang, One of Tourist Attractions
articles.content:
Mt. Myohyang, One of Tourist Attractions
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Mt. Myohyang in North Phyongan Province is known to be one of six famous mountains in the DPRK.
					 In recent years, paths to newly discovered scenic spots have been completed.
					
					 The mountain boasts of fantastic scenery like waterfalls, ponds and rocks and peaks. Among them are Samchon Pond in the area of Piro Peak, Tanphung Pond in the Chonthae Ravine and Unsil Pond, 2.5 meter deep and 400 square meters wide, in the Chilsong Ravine.
					
					 Especially, 24 km-long sightseeing path was newly opened in the area of Piro Peak, fully providing convenience and safety to tourists with a number of pavilions and resting sites.

articles.title: Historical Novel "Ri Je Ma" Published
articles.content:
Historical Novel "Ri Je Ma" Published
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Art and Literature Publishing House of the DPRK published historical novel "Ri Je Ma".
					 Ri Je Ma (1837-1900) was one of those who made big contributions to developing the Oriental medicine in the 19th century.
					
					 The novel deals with his tireless efforts to define the medical theory on four kinds of physical constitutions for the first time in the field of medical science, and crystallize the theory in his book "Tonguisusebowon" (four volumes) in 1894. Ri read a lot of books from his early years to possess broad and deep knowledge about different fields and devoted all his life to the research into traditional medicine.
					
					 The novel is now getting great popularity among people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Lift Their "May 24 Step"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges S. Korean Authorities to Lift Their "May 24 Step"
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article terms the south Korean authorities' "May 24 step" an antiquated leftover of confrontation between compatriots which should have been thrown into the dumping ground of history much earlier.
					 The "step" is a factor of having pushed the inter-Korean relations into freeze as it totally blocks personal and material exchange between the north and the south, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is quite natural that the "step" should be totally lifted to pave the way for dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south.
					
					 The south Korean regime is claiming that "a responsible measure" should be taken before the lifting of the "step." This sophism, however, can never convince anyone.
					
					 It had better stop acting like an ostrich with its head in the sand and honestly meet the requirements of different social circles in south Korea for thorough probe into the truth behind the Cheonan warship sinking case.
					
					 No matter how loudly the south Korean puppet forces may call for "dialogue" and "cooperation", leaving the "step" as it is, this will only invite condemnation and derision from the public at home and abroad.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities persistently cling to the "step," this will only bring to light their despicable true colors as warmongers pursuing confrontation and war, not exchange and cooperation.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, the puppet ruling quarters should clearly know that there can be neither dialogue nor cooperation between the north and the south as long as the above-said "step" remains in force.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Challenge to DPRK's Legitimate Exercise of Right to Self-defence Snubbed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Challenge to DPRK's Legitimate Exercise of Right to Self-defence Snubbed
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group, taken aback by the DPRK's successful underwater test-fire of ballistic missile from strategic submarine, is making much fuss, sending a letter to the UN "committee for sanctions against the DPRK" and calling for close cooperation with the international community.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says:
					
					 This clearly shows the miserable plight of the south Korean puppet forces keen to prolong their remaining days by clinging to the coattails of outside forces.
					
					 The puppet forces have no face to talk about "threat" from someone.
					
					 They claim there is nothing to care about their acts of bringing the danger of a nuclear war to the nation through madcap war drills targeting the north they are staging together with outside forces but the measure taken to protect the destiny of the nation by dint of war deterrent built by compatriots poses a "threat" to them. This is sheer nonsense. 
					
					 They trumpeted about cooperation with outside forces and cried out for stifling the DPRK, whenever they opened their mouths, bringing the inter-Korean relations to the worst catastrophe and pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a war. Yet, they are raising a hue and cry over "threat" from someone. This reminds one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 No matter what rhetoric the puppet forces may let loose to play down and deny the historic significance of the measure taken by the DPRK to bolster up capability for self-defence and abuse it for escalating the confrontation with the compatriots in the north, this will sound as a ridiculous jargon of the fear-stricken loser.
					
					 The above-said measure amounts to a declaration of justice as it dealt a merciless sledge-hammer blow at the confrontation maniacs risking their lives.
					
					 They had better stop running riot, bearing in mind what miserable end those who challenged the DPRK's legitimate exercise of the right to self-defence will met.

articles.title: Papers Warn S. Korean Warmongers Not to Go Reckless
articles.content:
Papers Warn S. Korean Warmongers Not to Go Reckless
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Han Min Gu, puppet minister of Defense of south Korea, let loose a spate of invectives against the DPRK, asserting that its test-fire of ballistic missile from its strategic submarine  was a "reckless provocation and threat". In the wake of his outbursts Choe Yun Hui, puppet chairman of the joint chiefs of staff, made a trip to Ryonchon, Kyonggi Province during which he cried out for scorching the "enemy's bases for provocation and forces commanding and supporting them". Jong Ho Sop, puppet navy chief of staff, and Ri Sang Hun, commander of the puppet marine corps and commander for defending northwestern  islands, inspected their units, ordering them to "contain" and "punish enemy force."
					 Commenting on this, papers Tuesday term those outbursts a deliberate provocative racket for pushing the tense situation on the Korean peninsula into the worst catastrophe.
					
					 The north-south relations have reached an acute phase of confrontation entirely due to the criminal moves of the puppet conservative group to stifle the compatriots in the north in league with foreign forces, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Quite clear is what the puppet military warmongers are seeking in escalating the tension to an extreme phase through the above-said war drumbeating. Their aim is to justify the provocative war drills being staged by them together with foreign forces against the DPRK under the pretext of "its threat," a fiction, and, furthermore, ignite a nuclear war against it.
					
					 The puppet forces are now recklessly bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula. It is ridiculous for them to talk about "punishment" as they are no more than colonial stooges and war servants of the U.S.
					
					 Minju Joson warns the puppet group not to act rashly if they do not want to meet a disastrous end.

articles.title: Joint National Event Marking June 15 Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Joint National Event Marking June 15 Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Pusan Committee for the Promotion of the Joint National Event of south Korea held a meeting at the Pusan Ilbo office on May 22 at which it called for successful holding of the joint national event to mark the 15th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. 
					 It was attended by representatives of more than 40 political parties and civic and public organizations in the Pusan area. 
					
					 Speakers at the meeting stressed the need to bring to success the joint national event for improving the relations between the south and the north. 
					
					 They noted that to this end it is necessary to intensify activities to let more people participate in the event. 
					
					 They stressed the need to successfully hold the event through a practical movement of the people and have the "May 24 step" lifted and the south-north relations mended despite hurdles lying in the way of reunification.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Urged to Lift "May 24 Step"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Urged to Lift "May 24 Step"
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Different organizations of south Korea held a meeting in Seoul on May 24 to demand the authorities lift the "May 24 step", according to south Korean internet paper Thongil News. They included the Seoul Preparatory Committee for June 15 Joint National Event, the Headquarters of the Movement for Reunified Korean Nation and the Emergency Measure Committee of the South-North Economic Cooperation Business.
					 At the meeting speakers termed the "step" a measure for blocking inter-Korean reconciliation and cooperation.
					
					 Cooperation undertakings between the south and the north were not simple economic activities but very important work for reunification, they said, adding:
					
					 Pursuant to this "step," the authorities hamstrung the efforts for improving the inter-Korean relations and heading for reunification through soccer game of workers in the south and the north.
					
					 They urged the authorities to lift the "step" and come out for improved inter-Korean relations.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Teachers Denounced
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Teachers Denounced 
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) on May 20 held a press conference outside the puppet Ministry of Education to accuse the authorities of suppressing teachers, according to the south Korean internet paper Voice of People.
					 Teachers under Jongyojo launched an action for two days off after voting on April 24 in demand of increased public pension and probe into truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster. 
					
					 The ministry filed a complaint with the Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office against 24 members of the Central Executive Committee of Jongyojo including its chairman on the charge of violation of "ban on group activities except for the performance of duties by public officials". 
					
					 Meanwhile, the Jongro Police Station in Seoul summoned the chairman of Jongyojo for questioning on May 13. 
					
					 At the press conference Jongyojo demanded the ministry stop labeling teachers' exercise of their legitimate rights an illegal action and immediately halt the suppression of them.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Tajik Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Tajik Figure
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- Sh. Shabdolov, chairman of the Communist Party of Tajikistan, released a statement on May 20 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 He said that Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C. of the WPK on June 19, 1964 marked a historic event of great significance in the strengthening and development of the WPK. 
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il strengthened the WPK into an invincible party whose all members are united in the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung, the Juche idea, and into an experienced, tested and ever-victorious party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il wisely led the WPK to fulfill its role as an organizer and guide advancing the Korean revolution to victory, and achieved great successes.
					
					 The Korean people are now waging a dynamic struggle for the building of a thriving nation under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: Korean Folk Costumes Introduced by Germany
articles.content:
Korean Folk Costumes Introduced by Germany
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany on May 19 posted on its website an article titled "Good qualities of the nation are encouraged" which introduced chima (skirt) and jogori (jacket), Korean folk costumes.
					 The article said:
					
					 Korean women are very fond of wearing chima and jogori, beautiful and traditional women's costumes, since long ago, a tradition peculiar to the Korean nation. They represent the feelings and emotion of the Korean nation with their unique forms, patterns and colors.
					
					 Korean women love wearing chima and jogori with different forms and mellow colors, especially on holidays and at wedding ceremonies.
					
					 Chima and jogori are also popular among children.
					
					 The article also introduced "Arirang", a typical folk song of the Korean nation.

articles.title: UK Body Marks Anniversary of Kwangju Popular Uprising
articles.content:
UK Body Marks Anniversary of Kwangju Popular Uprising
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its internet homepage an article on May 15 to mark the 35th anniversary of the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 The Kwangju Popular Uprising was the heroic resistance of south Korean people for achieving independence, democracy and reunification against the military fascist dictatorship and the U.S. colonial rule, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The ardent wishes of the Kwangju demonstrators for independence, democracy and reunification have not been achieved though 35 years have passed since then. 
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group makes all the fields including politics, economy and culture further dependent on the U.S. and makes a mess of initial successes for democracy made by the people, reviving the past "yusin" fascist dictatorship system. 
					
					 The dark reality in south Korea is little short of the situation at the time of the Kwangju Popular Uprising. 
					
					 It would be possible for the south Korean people to frustrate the U.S. colonial domination and traitorous misrule by the Park Geun Hey group and realize the aspirations for independence, democracy and reunification only when they inherit the soul of the Kwangju demonstrators and turn out in the massive resistance against the regime.

articles.title: Swiss Organizations Support Righteous Struggle of Chongryon
articles.content:
Swiss Organizations Support Righteous Struggle of Chongryon
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on May 19 to mark the diamond jubilee of the formation of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon). 
					 The Korean people greet the diamond jubilee of the formation of Chongryon, the joint statement said, and went on:
					
					 Chongryon was founded on May 25, Juche 44 (1955) on the initiative of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Chongryon advancing under the banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the dignified overseas citizens' organization of the DPRK defending the democratic national rights of Koreans in Japan and it fulfills the role of the diplomatic mission of the DPRK. 
					
					 Chongryon has achieved great development under the wise guidance of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 It has made positive efforts for the withdrawal of the U.S. troops from south Korea, independent and peaceful reunification of Korea, normalization of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Japan and friendship between the peoples of the two countries. 
					
					 The statement extended solidarity to the righteous struggle of Chongryon to protect democratic national rights of Koreans in Japan and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Holidays to Be Celebrated in Nigeria
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Holidays to Be Celebrated in Nigeria
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian national preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th anniversaries of Korea's liberation and founding of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) was formed in Abuja on May 21.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria who is chairman of the Nigeria-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to widely introduce through media the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and achievements made by the Korean people in defending the sovereignty and building a thriving socialist nation under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un and to arrange meetings and film shows and other colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the anniversaries.

articles.title: Great Is Vitality of June 15 Declaration: Guinean Bulletin
articles.content:
Great Is Vitality of June 15 Declaration: Guinean Bulletin
						
 Pyongyang, May 26 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a bulletin on May 19 to mark the 15th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The bulletin stressed that vitality of the June 15 joint declaration was tremendous.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Echo of June 15" said the north-south summit was held for the first time after 55-year division of the Korean nation and the historic June 15 joint declaration was adopted for settling the issue of national reunification independently and peacefully.
					
					 As soon as the declaration was open to public, it won the positive support and sympathy from the broad international community as well as the Korean nation and a new era was opened in the cause of Korea's reunification, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 The June 15 era for reunification, however, faced grave challenges after Lee Myung Bak took power in south Korea.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group totally negated the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, an action programme for the joint declaration.
					
					 Tense north-south relations are getting worse due to the Park Geun Hye regime. 
					
					 The Korean nation is waging a nationwide struggle to carry out the June 15 joint declaration and bring about the era of peace, reunification and prosperity.
					
					 The international community sincerely hopes that the Korean nation will reunify the country under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration at an early date and consolidate peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un se fotografia con personas contribuyentes a exitoso lanzamiento de ensayo de SLBM
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un se fotografia con personas contribuyentes a exitoso lanzamiento de ensayo de SLBM
						
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, se fotografio frente al edificio del Comite Central del PTC junto con los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios quienes contribuyeron a poner de pleno manifiesto a todo el mundo el potente poderio de Corea de Songun al lograr exitos perfectos en el lanzamiento de ensayo del proyectil balistico del submarino estrategico.
					Cuando el Mariscal salio al lugar de filmacion, todos los participantes le dieron calurosas aclamaciones.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que el acabado de la tecnica del lanzamiento del proyectil balistico del submarino es nuevo acontecimiento historico que manifesto plenamente la dignidad y el aspecto majestuoso de Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y evaluo a los cientificos, tecnicos, obreros y funcionarios de la rama de la ciencia de defensa nacional y de la fabrica de materiales belicos que desarrollaron una potente arma estrategica y prepararon un regalo excelente para el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC.
					
					Anadio que pudieron crear un milagro tan asombroso la ardiente fidelidad, el noble patriotismo y la indoblegable voluntad de ellos tendentes a glorificar las inmortales hazanas de los grandes Lideres acumuladas en el desarrollo de la industria para la defensa nacional y ejecutar a cabalidad las tareas combativas del Partido.
					
					El Mariscal aprecio reiteradamente las proezas de los participantes y se fotografio con ellos.
					
					El Mariscal expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que en lo adelante tambien ellos haran un gran aporte al fortalecimiento cualitativo del EPC al producir mejor muchos pertrechos sofisticados a estilo coreano para realizar el proposito estrategico del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					Le acompanaron Kim Chun Sop y Ri Pyong Chol.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje a Chongryon y coreanos residentes en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje a Chongryon y coreanos residentes en Japon
						
Pyongyang, 26 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 60o aniversario de la fundacion de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon), el Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 25 a la mencionada organizacion y los coreanos residentes en Japon un mensaje intitulado "Abramos una nueva era de prosperidad para el movimiento de los coreanos en Japon en acato al proposito del gran companero Kim Jong Il".
					El texto completo sigue:
					
					Para mi es un motivo de gran alegria celebrar significativamente el aniversario 60 de la fundacion de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon (Chongryon) en una coyuntura convulsiva en que se libra una intensa campana para acoger como magnos acontecimientos nacionales el aniversario 70 de la liberacion de la patria y el de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea. 
					
					En ocasion de la efemeride, extiendo mis mas calurosas felicitaciones y cordiales saludos al companero Ho Jong Man, presidente del Presidium Central de la Chongryon, a todos otros funcionarios e integrantes de la organizacion.
					
					Estamos hablando de una prestigiosa agrupacion de ciudadanos de la RPD de Corea en el extranjero, creada y dirigida por los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					La gloriosa trayectoria recorrida por esa organizacion lleva impregnados la acertada direccion, el gran esfuerzo y consagracion de los grandes lideres para fortalecerla como una original agrupacion que represente los derechos e intereses de todos los compatriotas residentes en Japon. 
					
					El gran companero Kim Il Sung es el precursor del movimiento de compatriotas en el extranjero en la epoca de la independencia, fundador de la Chongryon, benefactor y padre afectuoso de los coreanos en Japon.
					
					Conocedor de la situacion del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon que, sin poder encontrar un camino correcto, afrontaba el dilema de seguir existiendo o perecer, lo salvo de la crisis al presentar la sabia orientacion de modificar el lineamiento y formo la Chongryon, primera agrupacion de coreanos en el extranjero de caracter original. Ilumino el camino a seguir por ella en cada fase de su desarrollo, amparo en su generoso regazo a ella y a los compatriotas en Japon y los condujo por un trayecto glorioso.
					
					El gran companero Kim Jong Il es el destacado dirigente y defensor del destino de los compatriotas radicados en Japon quien, en respuesta al gran ideal del gran Lider Kim Il Sung, convirtio a la Chongryon en la abanderada del amor al pais y la nacion, paradigma del patriotismo y lealtad y modelo de las organizaciones de compatriotas en el extranjero. 
					
					Fue el quien consolido las filas de los funcionarios de la Chongryon en monoliticas tropas de intransigente idea e inconmovible fe y salvaguardo fidedignamente a la asociacion con el arma omnipotente del Songun (prioridad de los asuntos militares ?N.T.). Considero a ella parte de la patria socialista y a los compatriotas en Japon hermanos consanguineos. Aun durante la Marcha Penosa, periodo dificil para la patria, les brindo una sincera ayuda espiritual y material a favor del desarrollo de la ensenanza nacional, la dignidad y la vida estable de los compatriotas. Gracias a esa muestra de confianza y amor, la Chongryon ha podido hacer gala de su condicion de modelo de las organizaciones de coreanos radicados en distintas latitudes del mundo.
					
					De hecho, los seis decenios de la historia de la Chongryon se caracterizan por la original idea de los grandes lideres sobre el movimiento de coreanos en el extranjero y su destacada orientacion, asi como por su benevolencia que representa el noble amor a la nacion y que genera leyendas de afecto a los compatriotas. 
					
					Bajo la sabia orientacion y amor de las grandes figuras del monte Paektu, a lo largo de seis decadas de su historia la Chongryon ha avanzado por un camino empedrado de gloria y ha realizado relevantes proezas para la patria y la nacion. 
					
					Al correr la misma suerte con sus lideres y patria, se ha fortalecido como tropas indestructibles que exhiben sin reservas el poderio de la unidad monolitica. En el fragor de la lucha para establecer en su seno un original sistema de ideologia y direccion, ha crecido como una autentica agrupacion patriotica sustentada en la idea Juche que confia y sigue solamente a los grandes lideres y asume como tarea principal la materializacion de sus propositos y deseos. Hoy demuestra con orgullo su verdadero aspecto al impulsar energicamente el movimiento de los coreanos en Japon como agrupacion poderosa, compactamente unida en lo organico e ideologico sobre la base de la gran idea Juche y profundamente arraigada en las amplias masas de compatriotas. 
					
					Asimismo, demuestra su potencial como organizacion prometedora que hereda invariablemente el patriotismo. Su orgullo y fuerza motriz parten del hecho de que, aun en la dificil condicion que supone vivir en el suelo foraneo, los hijos compatriotas crecen como verdaderos patriotas bajo un ordenado sistema de la educacion nacional que abarca desde la ensenanza primaria hasta la universitaria, que se forma la flor y nata de la sociedad de compatriotas, entre ellos los miembros activos de la juventud y los jovenes comerciantes e industriales, que haran resplandecer la historia del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon, y que todos ellos heredan firmemente el patriotismo y la lealtad. 
					
					La Chongryon ha venido contribuyendo sustancialmente a la sagrada causa por la prosperidad de la patria socialista y la reunificacion nacional. Imbuidos del fervoroso patriotismo, tanto sus cuadros como los demas compatriotas respiran el mismo aire y caminan al compas de los de la patria y han hecho aportes excepcionales a su florecimiento. Convencida de la justeza de la orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Gobierno de la Republica sobre la reintegracion nacional, la Chongryon ha hecho cuanto esta a su alcance para lograrla, asi como ha contribuido a la solidaridad con el pueblo japones y otros del mundo y a elevar el prestigio de la Republica en la arena internacional. 
					
					Nuestro Partido y gobierno se sienten infinitamente orgullosos de contar con la Chongryon, agrupacion de compatriotas en el extranjero infinitamente fieles a su lider, patria y nacion. 
					
					Aprovecho esta ocasion para rendir tributo a Han Tok Su, a otros cuadros de la Chongryon y compatriotas patrioticos de la vieja generacion quienes dieron su vida al enaltecimiento de los grandes lideres, la fundacion de esa asociacion y el desarrollo del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon, asi como para transmitir mi cordial agradecimiento a todos los funcionarios de la Chongryon y los compatriotas en Japon quienes se entregan en cuerpo y alma a la causa patriotica de la agrupacion, sin aspirar a la fama o la remuneracion. 
					
					Hoy la referida organizacion y los compatriotas en Japon enfrentan la honrosa tarea de hacer valer las sempiternas hazanas de direccion de los grandes lideres, acompasar los pasos con los de la patria en el avance general y asi producir nuevos cambios en el movimiento de los coreanos en Japon. 
					
					A la Chongryon le corresponde realizar todas las labores segun la intencion y el deseo de los grandes lideres y abrir una nueva era de prosperidad para el movimiento de los coreanos en Japon en acato al legado del gran General.
					
					Le incumbe robustecerse como una poderosa y original organizacion de compatriotas en el extranjero que se honra por los respetables nombres de las eminentes figuras del monte Paektu. 
					
					Le atane anteponer a todo lo demas la tarea de establecer el sistema de ideologia y direccion que se nutre de la idea Juche y profundizar en ella ininterrumpidamente. 
					
					La Chongryon enaltecera eternamente a los grandes companeros Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, defendera resueltamente sus ideas sobre la construccion de la misma y sus sempiternos meritos de direccion y los perpetuara. Tomara consecuentemente los pensamientos y las proezas de los grandes lideres como eterno programa del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon y cumplira al pie de la letra las instrucciones dadas por ellos a la misma y a los compatriotas en Japon.
					
					Ante todo, seguira empenandose en fortalecer la unidad monolitica de sus filas en todos los aspectos.
					
					Todas las organizaciones e integrantes de la Chongryon la consideraran como primera tarea del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon, se aglutinaran con una misma idea y voluntad en torno a la Direccion Central y culminaran con el potencial del companerismo la causa patriotica iniciada a base de la unidad entre los camaradas. Las organizaciones de la Chongryon, conscientes de que la unidad monolitica de sus filas y la sincera fraternidad entre los compatriotas constituyen la fuerza de la Chongryon y abren la nueva era de prosperidad para el movimiento de los coreanos en Japon, haran cuanto puedan para lograr la inquebrantable unidad de los compatriotas.
					
					Es preciso realizar como una ofensiva la propaganda y la educacion encaminadas a poner de manifiesto el potencial espiritual de los compatriotas.
					
					La Chongryon se concentrara en educar a los cuadros y otros compatriotas en la grandeza de los lideres y el patriotismo de Kim Jong Il y efectuara constantemente la educacion en la idea de priorizar a la nacion coreana y la propaganda sobre la historia y las tradiciones del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon. En vista del cambio de la situacion, se profundizara en la educacion en la confianza para que todos los cuadros de la Chongryon, las nuevas generaciones y otros compatriotas en Japon se convenzan firmemente de la invencibilidad de la patria socialista y la justeza de la causa patriotica de la Chongryon y lleven adelante invariablemente y con firmeza las tradiciones de amor al pais y la nacion, establecidas por sus antecesores.
					
					En atencion a la actual exigencia y circunstancia, establecera un ordenado sistema de propaganda y educacion y aplicara sin cesar eficaces formas y metodos de propaganda y agitacion. En correspondencia a las particularidades y la preparacion de los lectores, popularizaran las publicaciones como Joson Sinbo y elevaran su fuerza de atraccion. Como organizaciones artisticas coreanas en el extranjero que se han desarrollado bajo la atencion de los lideres, el Conjunto Operistico Kumgangsan y otros musico-coreograficos locales realizaran intensas actividades artisticas acordes al sentimiento y la sicologia de los compatriotas, a fin de inculcarles el espiritu de la nacion coreana y enardecer su entusiasmo patriotico.
					
					Urge hacer de la Chongryon una potente organizacion patriotica arraigada profundamente en los compatriotas.
					
					Las organizaciones de base como las filiales y ramas seran como solidas piedras de una muralla que defiende al pais y la nacion. La Chongryon pondra empeno en fortalecer la filial, base regional del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon. Revitalizara las organizaciones ramales que constituyen principales unidades de la vida de los compatriotas, de suerte que dondequiera que viven los compatriotas reine el ambiente de armonia, unidad y amor al pais y la nacion. Las organizaciones y entidades a todos los niveles de la Chongryon ganaran a mas compatriotas de todos los sectores mediante una energica labor politica con las masas, y de esta manera consolidaran y ampliaran en las masas la base del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon. En todas sus actividades la Chongryon se atendra a la linea de masas, concedera preferencia absoluta a las comodidades de vida y la defensa de los intereses de los compatriotas y resolvera todos los problemas apoyandose en su entusiasmo patriotico
					
					  y fuerza creadora.
					
					Con miras a aumentar sus propias fuerzas patrioticas, la Chongryon se enfocara en el movimiento de devolverles la nacionalidad a los que la han perdido y vincularlo estrechamente con varias actividades culturales nacionales, deportes masivos, movimientos en defensa de los derechos y actividades de servicio y beneficencia, para que sea un movimiento poderoso protagonizado por los mismos compatriotas y que se impulsa con la fuerza de ellos.
					
					Defendera los derechos democraticos nacionales y los intereses de los compatriotas en Japon y seguira dedicando ingentes esfuerzos a la educacion nacional y a la labor con los jovenes, comerciantes e industriales compatriotas.
					
					La mision principal y el deber que asume la Chongryon es proteger los mencionados derechos e intereses. Trabajara con empeno en defender y ampliar todos los derechos de los compatriotas como ciudadanos de un Estado soberano en el extranjero, entre ellos los derechos a la educacion y el negocio y la libertad de viaje a la patria, y luchara de manera resuelta contra todas las medidas discriminatorias y los actos inhumanitarios que violen sus derechos e intereses.
					
					Mantendra invariablemente la educacion nacional como su tarea fundamental. Implantara el Juche en ella para priorizar el fomento del espiritu patriotico y la identidad nacional; mejorara el contenido y metodo de la ensenanza a la altura de la epoca de la economia del conocimiento, para demostrar asi las ventajas y la vitalidad de la educacion democratica nacional. A la Universidad Coreana, centro docente patrocinado por la Chongryon, le corresponde elevar sin cesar el nivel de la labor docente encaminada a formar a los estudiantes como verdaderos patriotas y competentes profesionales, de modo que sea reconocida como digna y famosa universidad de ciudadanos de la prestigiosa Republica en el extranjero.
					
					Hoy las nuevas generaciones de compatriotas en Japon desempenan el papel protagonico en las actividades patrioticas de la Chongryon y de la manera de su preparacion depende el futuro del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon. A la Chongryon, organizacion patriotica que nuestros grandes lideres nos dejaron como herencia, le compete preparar a los jovenes como confiables continuadores de sus actividades que se muestran incolumes ante todas las adversidades. La Union de Jovenes Coreanos en Japon, la Asociacion de Jovenes Comerciantes e Industriales Coreanos y la Union de coreanos radicados en Japon que estudian en otros paises deben lograr que siga prevaleciendo el valioso legado de las generaciones anteriores y educar a los jovenes compatriotas para que vivan con dignidad manteniendo su identidad como coreanos en cualquier momento y lugar. Tambien la Union de Mujeres Democraticas Coreanas en Japon se concentrara en la labor con las compatriotas de la nueva generacion para
					
					  que ellas mantengan invariable la nacionalidad en la comunidad de compatriotas y preserven intacta la orgullosa tradicion en la cual las mujeres mueven una rueda de la carreta en las actividades patrioticas de la Chongryon.
					
					Es necesario guiar a los comerciantes e industriales, sector principal de la Chongryon y fuerzas fundamentales del movimiento de los coreanos en Japon, a participar de manera activa en la gesta patriotica de la Chongryon. La Federacion de Comerciantes e Industriales Coreanos en Japon y otras agrupaciones economicas deben proteger y ayudar con sinceridad a sus colegas compatriotas, de suerte que estos revitalicen sus actividades.
					
					La Chongryon y los compatriotas en Japon contribuiran a fortalecer a la patria socialista y a anticipar la reunificacion nacional, cumpliendo asi plenamente la mision y el deber que asumen ante la patria y la nacion.
					
					Con el espiritu patriotico coadyuvaran a la noble causa por el fortalecimiento y la prosperidad de la patria socialista.
					
					El destino de los compatriotas en el extranjero esta inseparablemente unido con el de la patria. El prestigio de ellos y de sus organizaciones se elevan en la misma medida en que se hace poderosa la patria. Los funcionarios de la Chongryon y demas compatriotas defenderan por todos los medios la dignidad y el prestigio de la patria socialista y contribuiran a la construccion de una potencia socialista segun la disponibilidad de cada cual: con la fuerza, con el conocimiento o con el dinero.
